column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I arrived around 1pm with no reservation. I planned to wait at least 30 minutes
column2: nope just 10? I sat down and was immediately greeted by my waiter Saul
column3: who was great. He took my order and my food arrived shortly after. It was delicious. It's just no other way to describe the serving. I'd recommend anyone to give this place a try. You won't be disappointed.
